IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE GRANTS TO CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS, ESPECIALLY THOSE SERVING WOMEN AND CHILDREN.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE GRANTS TO CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS, ESPECIALLY THOSE SERVING WOMEN AND CHILDREN.
IRS990.Desc: IN 2022, MARY BRADLEY CORPORATION MADE 35 GRANTS TOTALING $580,000. OF THESE GRANTS, THERE WERE 5 GRANTS TOTALLING $50,000 THAT WERE COVID GRANTS. THESE GRANTS WERE FOR MEDICAL STUDENTS, TUITION SCHOLARSHIPS, SUSTAINABLE FARMS, DRILLING WATER WELLS, FOOD PROGRAMS FOR SENIORS, AID TO SEXUAL VIOLENCE VICTIMS, HELPING NEEDY CHILDREN, BUILDING A HEALTH CENTER, COVID RELIEF, SUPPLIES FOR CHILDREN IN FOSTER CARE AND LEAVING FOSTER CARE, A NURSE FOR HEALTH AND WELLNESS, MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES, TRANSPORTATION FOR STUDENTS, PURCHASE AN AMBULANCE, ETC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: RESTATING THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION AND BYLAWS, LONG TERM BORROWING, PURCHASE AND SALE OF RENTAL PROPERTY, APPOINTMENT AND REMOVAL OF INDIVIDUALS ON THE BOARD, APPOINTMENT AND REMOVAL OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE CORPORATION, APPROVAL OF THE APPOINTMENT OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITORS OF THE CORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS SCANNED AND EMAILED TO EACH DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD MEMBERS ARE COVERED BY THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. THE BOARD REVIEWS AND RENDERS DETERMINATIONS ON WHETHER A CONFLICT EXISTS. IF A CONFLICT IS DISCOVERED, THE PERSON OF INTEREST IS NOT ALLOWED PARTICIPATION IN VOTING ON THAT MATTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19

ReasonableCauseExplanation.ExplanationTxt: OVER THE YEARS, MARY BRADLEY CORPORATION HAS HAD A GOOD RECORD OF FILING FORM 990 ON TIME. HOWEVER, IN 2022, THERE WERE MANY STAFFING ISSUES AND COMPUTER PROBLEMS THAT PREVENTED A TIMELY FILING OF FORM 990. WHEN THE ERROR WAS DISCOVERED, MARY BRADLEY CORPORATION APPROACHED OUR AUDIT FIRM FOR HELP WITH THE FILING FORM 990. WE RESPONDED TO ALL REQUESTS FOR INFORMATION TIMELY AND THE RETURN IS NOW BEING FILED AS SOON AS WE COULD GET IT COMPLETED. WE REQUEST YOU ABATE ANY LATE FILING PENALTIES. IN THE FUTURE, WE WILL USE OUR AUDIT FIRM TO CONTINUE WITH THEIR PREPARATION OF OUR FORM 990, WHICH WE WILL REVIEW AND TIMELY SUBMIT.
